title: Roblox launcher not working
content: Whenever I try to play a game on roblox, nothing happens. It doesn't try to open the launcher, a pop up just appears saying "You're moments away from the fun!" or whatever and prompts me to download the launcher even though I already have it. I've tried resetting my cookies and configuring my preferences but nothing's helped. I don't know if this is because of a recent update or because of something I'm doing. Roblox works just fine when I open the launcher by itself or on different browsers. Is there anything I can do to fix this?
creator: stxrryboo

title: Unable to place bookmarks on Bookmark Toolbar
content: For some reason every time I try I get a black circle with a diagonal line symbol, indicating I cant do it, ive already tried in Troubleshoot aka Safe Mode, its the same! Ive even deleted xulstore.json, still the same, I have no idea whats causing it.
creator: Imot

title: how to restore multiple closed tabs; traditional recently closed windows and tabs or restore last session is not an option.
content:
I had multiple Firefox browsers and tabs open - simultaneously, and shut off Desktop PC. Whereas, traditional 'restore previous session' option opened most recently opened tab and site, and disregarded all other open tabs and browsers. Whereas, tabs and browsers I wish to open are still on Desktop, although Mozilla will not re-open them as they were (ie. will not re-assemble same order), instead Mozilla tried generating all tabs on one browser and then froze/crashed tyring to re-open all previously open tabs on one broser.

If you can, please assist with a step-by-step instructional - which instructs me on how to re-open all previous tabs which pre-date most recent preceding session (ie. disregard most recent preceding session) and re-open all other tabs which pre-dated most recent preceding session: as respective Desktop PC related-work was un-finished, and so that I might be able to continue at respective Desktop PC related-work.

Thank you. Adam
creator: AdClFr2ND27NbAve

title: Console - Web Element selector does not bring back up the console after selecting an element on web page
content: I'm new to Firefox, usually in other browser, like Chrome and Edge, when I use the selector to choose element and click on it, it will bring back the console but it doesn't seems to happen in Firefox. ( I'm using separate window for the console )
creator: zisheng0101

title: Shift+Delete No Longer Works
content: Recently I've been having trouble deleting selected urls. Holding down Shift+Delete doesn't do anything anymore unless I'm lucky and it'll delete one or two of the urls I choose but most of the time nothing happens at all! I never liked having to hold 2 buttons when pressing one worked just fine in the past but I dealt with it and I shouldn't have to open my whole history each time when doing it from a normal window should work. I don't like deleting my whole history and much rather pick and choose which ones to get rid of like let's plays with lots of parts.
creator: hylian_dragon_warrior

title: Bookmark Bar not importing from old computer
content:
Switching to a new Mac computer and trying to get the bookmarks back, especially the tool bar. I did the export and import steps. Both export to HTML and as a backup file. Next I airdrop it to the new computer and try and import it there. Seems to work (no errors), but no bookmarks. I have looked at google videos and tried searching you help area.

Chrome i just log in and it comes over, I remember losing everything in firefox last time I got a new computer and had to rebuild from scratch. I can't afford that again, please help.
creator: pugmac
